text.8th_paragraf: Automatic STARTTLS detection - Leave this option disabled if you have problems with the server certificate
text.7th_paragraf: Domain - In case you need to specify a HELO domain
text.6th_paragraf: Make sure that the data for sending SMS is valid by sending a Test SMS, in the respective module
text.5th_paragraf: The code of the Tax Offices is for the generation of the Modelo 25 Magnetic Support (.xml file) for submission in Finance Portal
text.4th_paragraf: Layout to be used for the notification e-mail to be sent to the entities selected in the Current Accounts. The title of the layout will be used as the subject of the e-mail
text.3rd_paragraf: All the documents generated through the button "Save and issue doc." will be generated with this type of document and with its predefined series
text.2nd_paragraf: This information will be used in reports and in the automatic completion of some forms.
text.1st_paragraf: You cannot change the subscription currency because you already have accounting entries made in this currency

model.hide_wizard_from_dash: Do not show Setup Wizard on Dashboard
model.hide_warnings_from_dash: Do not show warnings on the Dashboard
